text: here's your guide to the Golden Globes
this Sunday night is the Golden Globes
what are the Golden Gloves well it's a
big celebrity party and a TV broadcast
during which some awards are given out
by an organization called the hollywood
foreign press association now the
globe's have emerged over the last few
decades since they started being on
television really as a bellwether of the
Oscars but there's some important
differences between the academy of
motion picture arts and sciences which
gives out the oscars and the Hollywood
Foreign Press Association which gives
out the Globes the Academy as it's known
consists of around six thousand film
industry professionals the hollywood
foreign press association consists of
about 90 people and nobody's really sure
who they are or what they do except for
give out the Golden Globes and oddly
enough very often these two very
different organizations seem to arrive
at the same conclusions about what were
the best movies and best performances of
a given year the the races that have
some bearing maybe on the the emerging
Oscar race the Oscar nominations will be
announced about a week after the dust
has cleared from the globe's are in the
Best Picture Drama category social
network a favorite you know with the
King's Speech nipping at its heels and
some possibility there that inception or
the fighter might break through but I
have a feeling it's between the King's
Speech and the social network Ricky
Gervais is going to be the host so at
least there will be something to laugh
at or to laugh with and otherwise you
can just laugh at the Golden Globes and
join us again on Tuesday four times cast
